pages.text: To get started the first thing you need is a golden hoe. This will be your tool to create land claims. Holding the tool will display your current claim blocks and the amount you used (this number is usually $(bold)incorrect$())$(br2)To create a claim right click on one block to select a corner and on another block to set the other corner. If it was successful you will get a
message that a claim was created, else it will tell you why the creation failed.
